website_summaries.verdict: With nearly 2 hours of battery life, this vacuum can both vacuum and mop your floors, just not in one pass.
pros: Automatically turns away from carpet when mopping pad is attached
Use with Alexa or Google Home or control it by app
Can draw virtual boundaries, pick which parts to clean, and set schedules
cons: May not work well with iPhone X or later models
Must attach mopping pad to mop manually, and must remove it to vacuum

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this. I spent a lot of money to have this shipped to Mexico, paying import and shipping fees and after 6 months it just stopped working. Now I have an expensive piece of junk in my house. To prove it lost all suction, I put a piece of tape in the dust bin container to fool it into thinking it is installed, then I put some tape in the air flow duct and it just won't move at all meaning there is no suction anymore. Please ecovacs, reach out to me to try and find a solution for my case.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo E

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: After using the" dee" for a couple of days, I am really impressed by its function! Here are few things I want to share: Build quality-8/10 Noise level-10/10( extreme quiet, I can work on maths while it is running, better than Dyson!!) Hoovering-10/10( surprising results) NOT Getting stuck-9/10( smart machine since it has mapping system, just make sure there are no cables or loose clothes on the floor) Mopping-8/10 ( Using this feature to mop the kitchen floor and bathroom floor) Suction power-9/10 ( works really over on thick carpet, I am surprised by its power) Overall, I would rate it as 10, it is a great machine at a reasonable price and does everything I expect it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I want to love this so much and I almost do
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this so much and I almost do. The app really needs improvement. I noticed that I've gotten some updates, so they are working on it. I wish it could handle remembering more than one map. I've had issues with it going offline and having to remap my entire house. It does a pretty good job at vacuuming and it does an okay job at moping. I still have to mop for myself every so often, but this gets the in-between jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - will only last a few months
customer_reviews.text: This unit stopped charging after only a few months. It's a paperweight now. Good luck getting customer support with a chinese knock off vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Shmeg McGee

customer_reviews.title: IOS app does not support Iphone X or later
customer_reviews.text: After spending hours trying to get the vacuum setup, I contacted support and was told their apps do not support tablets or iPhone X or greater. You have to use the app to setup the wifi and do scheduling. Their website does not mention this at all. Here's the response from support on when their app will support the last two generations of phones: Hi, Thank you for reaching out. I am sorry to let you know that as of now we still do not have any updates or any specific time as to when will be having new App updates. We will keep you posted. Thanks. Best, Ingrid ECOVACS ROBOTICS Customer Service
customer_reviews.author: Bill Smith

customer_reviews.title: would have been 5 stars but the engineers really dropped ...
customer_reviews.text: would have been 5 stars but the engineers really dropped the ball when it comes to dealing with wires laying on the ground.. If I have some free time I might design & 3D print a COW CATCHER, for the front, to lift cables up and away.
customer_reviews.author: Skuibreaker

customer_reviews.title: Does not do what factory says it will do.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not hold up to claims the manufacturer makes. It is dumb. It beats the furniture up. Can't find the charging doc. Doesn't sink with faster wifi. Doesn't pick up things on top of carpet. Cost too much. Throughly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: prime member

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This robot vacuum is awesome. All the bells and whistles at half the price of the well known name brand of robot vacuums. If it wasn't impressive enough... it mops as well!
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: It works like a robot- but kinda like a human
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that a robot vacuum could be above average, but this is truly exceptional. The mop works great, and having only sat hardwoods it is easy cleaning. Without a doubt it makes robot mistakes, but that is to be expected. The memory of the house map needs to be improved, because each time it resets (every time you move the robot) it has to redo the map, and thus vacuum first. The next time, if everything goes perfect, it can mop. That is tough cause you have to insert the cleaner just ride, or it will reset. Overall though, it does an incredible job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase if you think this will mop. You will disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my second one. The first would not dispense water. So I fit an expends. The second one.....doesn’t dispense water. So I paid extra for a mopping function that does not work and customer service can’t figure out. I should have returned the vac for a refund but I was totally out of time and energy to follow thru with a return.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: It is very good for my house
customer_reviews.text: It is very good for my house , because I have a dog ,it can help me clean the dog’s hair and my hair , I can use app control it,so it really convenient. worth to buy,The only drawback is I think that electromagnetic time cannot use for long time , just use about 20mins , but it is enough for my house.I have a Alexa, so I can use Alexa control it. Compare to iRobot, I think ECOVACS are more cheaper than IRobot,but the function is exactly same.
customer_reviews.author: limeilin

customer_reviews.title: The best robot ever!
customer_reviews.text: I already have four, two Samsung cyclone force, one irobot rumba vacum and the irobot mope but beats all of them. First, don’t get stuck, second is zero noisy, clean with such perfection that is incredible. I love it and I am thinking to buy another to don’t have to go up and down in my house relocating this one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: The deepbot worked great for a few months but then stops working. It no longer moved forward, it stayed in one spot spinning in circles. After Ecovac determined it was a manufacturing/design issue they replaced the unit. After a few months later the new unit started to do the same thing, spinning in circles and not moving forward. Ecovac has not been very helpful trying to resolve the issue this time. Considering this is a potential design flaw, I do not recommend purchasing this brand or model.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum\mop to help keep house clean.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the OZMO 601 but went it back because I wanted one that would map my house for spot cleaning. This one is perfect. It will vacuum 1800 square feet of hardwood in 83 minutes and does a good job. i have 3 cats inside- no car hair anymore. I can turn it on while I'm at work. I can hold it to certain areas with virtual boundaries so it doesn't interrupt company. I can't mop manually anymore due to physical issues. This helps me keep my house clean if housekeeper doesn't come. It doesn't replace a thorough cleaning but love it for inbetween cleaning and spot cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: mp8765

customer_reviews.title: Can't get this to operate consistently
customer_reviews.text: I am having a hard time getting my deebot to finish a clean cycle, find the charger itself and get the map to remain constant. Customer service isn't very responsive. For $600+ I expect significantly more!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ECOVACS DEEBOT OZMO 930 to use in my house. I have wood floors and carpeting. It went from the wood floor to the carpeting with no problem. I also downloaded the app and was able to watch the DEEPOT while it was mapping the house and cleaning. The manual said it came with 4 side brushes but there was only two in the box. I emailed the manufacture at 5 :15 p.m. and received a reply the same day at 11:51 p.m. They apologized and told me to send them my full name and address. As soon as they came in they would send them to me. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but mopping feature stopped after 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great at first and was such a timesaver! I specifically got this one because of the mopping feature. I was extremely disappointed when that stopped working a couple months ago. So it lasted less than a year which is pretty pathetic. Don’t waste your money if you’re looking for a functioning mopping feature.
customer_reviews.author: lnvawds

customer_reviews.title: Worse vaccum
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vaccum a year ago and after a few months it just stopped working, customer service pretty good had me send it back and sent me a new one, 2nd one didn't sync up with app so they had me send it back and sent me a third one, same issues. At this point I wanted a refund but they said no so I opt to go with a cheaper model due to all the issues with this one. After having it for a few months it won't hold a charge and gets stuck and stops working. Will never go with this brand again and have lost $$ on this.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your time.  Definitely not worth your money.
customer_reviews.text: We are currently awaiting the arrival of our third replacement unit in one year. We purchased our first unit on November 22, 2018. First unit stopped mopping within 60 days. Second unit sent was used with broken parts. It appears that "refurbished" with this company means "put in a different box". Third unit lost the navigation system. In a few days we will be out of our warranty on the fourth unit as the warranty only goes for one year from the original date of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cognac!

customer_reviews.title: Wheels lock up and support is poor
customer_reviews.text: Right wheel locked up within 2 days, got a replacement, locked up within 2 days, got a replacement, locked up within two days. Support refused a refund, amazon refused a refund unless i had a signed letter from ecovacs indicating they were refusing the refund. Finally got amazon to accept the return with a restocking fee. Avoid ecovacs.
customer_reviews.author: Strawgate

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, just a few minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: So far this little vacuum is amazing. It is super quiet and has great suction power for the price. Mapping and movement of the robot is very precise (even with two dogs running around it). A few downsides, it cannot mop and vacuum at the same time. Second, the app is difficult to use and I still can't figure out how to save the different maps for floors of my home. Third, the dust bin is very small and has to be emptied after one or two uses. Overall, very happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Deebot!
customer_reviews.text: Love the DeeBot! Great suction and battery life. App shows map and can add boundaries. I dont think the mopping feature works very well weel. The mop pad reduces the efficiency of the vacuum, and often gets hung up on low pile carpet. Mop feature doesnt mop hardwood very well, leaves some spots still dirty (poor water dispersing even o n maximum)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Peterson

customer_reviews.title: love my floors
customer_reviews.text: a little challenging if you have step areas for first time set up but once its formatted your areas its awesome
customer_reviews.author: John M Webb

customer_reviews.title: Had to fix mopping feature myself
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum arrived broken. The mopping feature did not work out of the box. The support team from ecovacs wanted to give me the run around. Upon further inspection of the robot I noticed that the water pump connection was detached. I had to solder a new connection to make it function as advertised. At the end of the day it is a good vacuum but the company is not a well know name like roomba or neato so it is more difficult to get support or parts for the vacuum. The support from the company itself is lacking at best. So be aware if you are going to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: LDS GUIDANCE GETS STUCK AND TAPPING ON LDS DOES NOT CORRECT THEE LDS MALFUNCTION.
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT UNTIL THE LDS GUIDANCE SYSTEM WHEEL GOT STUCK. TAPPING ON THE LDS DID NOT HELP SO I TURNED THEE LDS WHEEL A TINY BIT AND THEE DEEBOT 930 STOP GIVING LDS MALFUNCTION STOP COMMAND. SO ANYWAAY DON'T KNOW IF IS GOING TO BE AN ONGOING ISSUE GLICH OR IF THE LDS IS DEFECTIVE. WHEN THE LDS GUIDANCE IS FUNCTIONING THEE DEEBOT 930 IS A ENGINEERING MARVEL AND FUNCTIONS AS ADVERTISED>>>> SO FAR. I HAVE ONLY USED IT FOR TWO HOURS.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After one year I have to say this has been a great product. The only flaw I can say is it gets kinda confused sometimes but it is overall a great addition to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler G.

customer_reviews.title: missing parts in the box
customer_reviews.text: loved the product did not want to give it back, but it was missing parts, they are not even familiar with there own product. and no replacement parts
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great...for a while
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until 10days after 1yr warranty. Now it just turns in circles. Customer Support NO HELP. Almost $600.00 - GONE. Had competitive model for YEARS with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning made simple
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday. It cleans my laminate floors and carpets with ease. I don't use the mop function very often but it does a good job. I picked this one over the popular ones due to the fact that I can clean the house in the dark while I'm away and it had functions the other popular name brands didn't
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality You’ll Come To Regret
customer_reviews.text: With in 6 months problems will begin to arise with this item. At a $500 price point, I highly recommend paying little more to have a product that reflects quality European engineering; you’ll wish you did. Finding quality replacement without a four plus week wait will be a problem and they wear out rather quickly. So wish I’d done the above myself. The app also is rather weak!
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Product fulfills expectations
customer_reviews.text: First of all, one thing that I noticed when unboxing was a scratch at the front part of the robot but that seems not impact in its functions. Robot is Really good. There are small issues with the software that sometimes bugs and mess with the base location. The robot sometimes (very few) can not pass througth some usual places and gets back to the base. the bottom line: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Used product, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this product is used? We just unboxed it and it has dirty pads and hair in the brush! Not to mention, the entire thing is dusty and the package is completely taped together. Not acceptable!!
customer_reviews.author: V. Huwer

customer_reviews.title: but so far it works great. Saves alot of time and removes all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a few weeks, but so far it works great. Saves alot of time and removes all the puppy fur.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S Wood

customer_reviews.title: Overall a pretty good buy
customer_reviews.text: Does pretty good for as small as it is. Gets caught up on cords a little too easily
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bragdon

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: i have been trying all day to get this vacuum to work properly. All it has been doing is running into my kitchen island and dining room table. thought it maybe needed time to map the house... Doesn’t seem to have worked. Will not even return to the charger. Not pleased, especially with the money i spent. Needed something asap. Sending this thing back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never worked right
customer_reviews.text: The laser detection system malfunctioned right when the warranty expired. Now its a $500 piece of trash
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: Problems
customer_reviews.text: Constantly having issues. First unit would not mop. See second unit worked well for 3 months and now constant LDS errors. Outside return policy and now deeply concerned on sending it back without getting it back working.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Mazur

customer_reviews.title: Can't use it with 5 G wifi
customer_reviews.text: The app does not work with 5 G wifi. And there is no remote to program it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Really dangerous with mop
customer_reviews.text: As a vacuum it works well but as a mop does not work. I've been trying to mop for 3 weeks and following the scant instructions in the manual does not work. When you place the water the robot lose the location, Start spinning and go over the top of the charger with the wet mop !! It Stays in the charger sector and Is really dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gabriel Monti

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months of use it stopped working and the company that sells it has no customer service, don't really waste your money on this item
customer_reviews.author: Bigmazt

customer_reviews.title: very good robot
customer_reviews.text: i like the moppingvsystem i thought it is 220v but its only 115v
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three Deebots and they have all died within a few months. Total waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: "yy5y"

customer_reviews.title: The small hose inside the reservoir is disconnected within 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Within two weeks of light using, a small hose inside the reservoir is disconnected making the cleaner useless specially for mopping. I tried to fix this hose but there is no way to reach it since it is sealed inside the reservoir.
customer_reviews.author: NavigatorX

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year and 8 months Died! LDS Malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for daily cleaning maintenance. It works very well on hard floors. The navigation is excellent but after 1 year and 8 months it just stopped moving during one of it's cleanings. The app says there is a LDS malfunction and recommends tapping on the sensor. This didn't work and the vacuum is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A Acuna Ardila

customer_reviews.title: Expensive toy
customer_reviews.text: U still have to pick up anything that is loose on the floor ( rugs, curtains, dog bowls). It runs out of power and does not make it back to the power charging station. Not worth $$$.
customer_reviews.author: MCupcakes

customer_reviews.title: I tested them for about a week and the Roborock was better in almost every way
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours doing research comparing this with other devices. I ended up purchasing this one and the Roborock S50, I tested them for about a week and the Roborock was better in almost every way. This device was not very thorough, always seemed like it was drunk and would not travel in a straight line. I wanted to keep this one from the start since it had 2 brushes in the front vs just one on other devices but the quality of the cleaning was just not as good as competitors. Also this device occasionally drops to $499 on Amazon so keep an eye on the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mapping doesnt keep very well.
customer_reviews.text: For the first few months it worked great. We bought in Nov and we already need replacement filter and main brush etc. The mapping seems to work well but often times it has to remap the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C Reeber

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Product, not recommended at all
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable product, broke down in less than 6 months, got replacement through warranty which broke down in another 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Isha

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how quiet yet strong my vacuum is. It also doesn’t bang into walls like other robot vacuums do.
customer_reviews.author: Garet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little unit
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet unit that can get under and back out of tables, hutches, book cases, chairs, etc. This is definitely not the robot vacuum of 3 years ago, this is 100x better.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: SHAME ON ECOVACS!
customer_reviews.text: The Deebot will not charge! I need someone to help me. Ecovacs will not help me on facebook! I spend all this money in vain
customer_reviews.author: poly m

customer_reviews.title: Do you have a return policy
customer_reviews.text: I dont like that it doesn't stay charged for long. More like 10 t0 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: MitashaEpps

customer_reviews.text: Why the robot volt is 100-130v ? My home volt is 240v , This is problem , what I can do?
customer_reviews.author: Farah al Hakeemy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this vacuum! Picks up just about everything, with the exception of some fur on the rugs, but generally very good at getting everything else! Not real noisy, but you know it’s there.
customer_reviews.author: FryeLockWife

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this robot !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! support all languages, clean up well dry and wet cleaning, one charge was enough for an apartment of 80 meters, the charging station finds it perfectly and quickly! This is a beautiful robot cleaner model!
customer_reviews.author: ilya

customer_reviews.title: Deebot is getting smarter.
customer_reviews.text: I have Deebot M80 before. This one cleans floor more thoroughly and less likely to stuck on something. It is also easier to find its way back to dock.
customer_reviews.author: QI ZHANG

customer_reviews.title: Cost Benefit: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: great suction, specially if you have pets in your house. mapping of apartment work pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Henrique Leme

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product does a pretty good job cleaning, not tried mopping feature yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchin Shah

customer_reviews.title: Good in general
customer_reviews.text: Nice and perfect to use, just the mobile app need to be improved.
customer_reviews.author: wasim alhawarna

customer_reviews.title: Does not link to wifi, therefore only vacuums. Will not mop unless linked.
customer_reviews.text: Does not link to wifi, therefore only vacuums. Will not mop unless linked.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn F.

customer_reviews.title: Urgently needs Apple HomeKit support
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning wise, it’s near perfect. But, it makes zero sense not to support Apple HomeKit when it supports Google and Alexa. Please update asap
customer_reviews.author: Er

customer_reviews.title: Update: Mopping feature has stopped working after 4 months of use. 😔
customer_reviews.text: Update No water tank arrived yet, it’s been 2 weeks. Update: Deebot is sending a new water tank , hopefully this will fix the issue. Update: I initially gave it a good rating but reverting it back. Mop feature has stopped to work, cleaning pad does not get wet anymore. I have left a voice mail to deebot support but have not heard back yet... Original review: It cleans very good but if you pick it up it looses its map memory. Moppping is well to but does not scrub too hard but still takes some dirt off of floors.
customer_reviews.author: Vikram

customer_reviews.title: Great robot vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is my first robot vacuum purchase, and I have been looking for a great robot vacuum for the past couple years. This is a gift to my mother's birthday. The cleaning function is very good. It does a great job for picking up hair. The mopping function works well too. However, I would like to give 4.5 stars if I could. As many people mentioned, the app needed improvement. Since my mom is happy with the gift, I would like give it 5 stars. If the robot vacuum is running great for the next few months, I may get another to my best friend as Christmas gift. Overall, I would like to recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: jennag

customer_reviews.title: Much better than my old one
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Deebot - and while it was good, it just stumbled around the house randomly cleaning things. It tended to get hung up on things fairly frequently - three kids tend leave their stuff everywhere. This is seems smarter - I've made a map, and now it methodically is taking care of the kitchen and avoiding the kids part of the TV room. So far, so good - and it's quieter than my old one. I've put the old deboot on my back deck - and it actually does a pretty good job outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: lawyerlady

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working right after  1 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that a $600 device fails to work after 18 months. It worked fine up until a few weeks ago. It has been unable to create a valid map. It loses its location and then finally just dies trying to find the charger. As you can see in the picture of the map it repeating the floor plan skewed. My home is basically a box. There are no angled areas.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th Robotic Vacuum, and this is only one fit all my expectations! Smart, really smart. The phone app is very good. Mopping - great! In mopping option, he avoids the carpet, so I don't have to worry about it. So, no more barriers.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey Dmitriyev

customer_reviews.title: I was sent a refurbished/previously used model
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a refurbished/previously used model. The Robot had smudge marks all over it and the front had scuff marks where it ran into stuff. Luckily Amazon has a good return policy. I decided to give it a try anyway. The Robot couldn't get over a rug in our main room. It got over another rug on hardwood once but after that it kept flipping over the rug and getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 days, no longer cleans, DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were very happy with the robot for 2 days, it no longer works, it will not clean, if reset it will not map, it will not return to its charger. Absolute POS. Contacted customer no service, and after several calls (you have to call from different numbers because they will not answer a second call from the same caller ID) they have asked me to video tape the robots behavior. I do not trust the company, I do not believe that they have intentions of standing behind their product, and I am returning it to Amazon for a refund. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Coats

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Really great. Does what is expected. The app is nice. Happy with it. However you should note if you have a room on another level or a room with a threshold that the bot can not get to once you manually move it to that room it will be confused and start over and re map. Then When you move it back to the area with the charging dock it will again get confused and have to remap. Sometimes it will give up and ask to be placed on the charging dock.
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Can live with out it!, but could use some basic sw inprovements!
customer_reviews.text: I love my 930. Even when the floors clean it up more dust! The damp mop is great. Mobile apps is good. I will buy a 2nd one! Cons: setup has to be on old school WiFi, dose not do well with doorway thresholds, it needs manual selection of maps per room! It needs better error messages that Speak the error or send a mobile app alert with the error. It should know/ use its name!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ross

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Support
customer_reviews.text: This robotic vacuum worked well for 13 months, at which point it stalled coming off the charging base. We were one month outside the warranty and support was terrible. They wouldn't provide any information on the construction or provide anything in the way or assistance. They wanted me to pay to ship to one of their authorized service centers with no guarantee I'd ever get it back. I took it to a local repair shop and they said Ecovacs wouldn't provide them anything either. I don't think the $500+ expense was much value for 13 months and I certainly won't purchase anything from Ecovacs again.
customer_reviews.author: George Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My brother continues to rave about this! It runs daily and even with the floor plan changing so much (they have an 11 year old Tom boy) it keeps up.
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: Cleans every spot
customer_reviews.text: Cleans every area in the house without missing a spot. Finds the charger with no problem. Mopping is that the best but is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Blandford

customer_reviews.title: great cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: works very well for cleaning. Mopping is not the greatest with a very small water tank. I wish I could more more choices of areas to choose to clean.... like choose rooms. one charge works for 88 min cleaning!!!
customer_reviews.author: I.K.

customer_reviews.title: 2 thing you need to know before you purchase a robotic vaccum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the only 2 cons are 1. It looses the map when you move the vaccum cleaner for any reason. 2. If electricity goes out no matter what time it is, the vaccum cleaner will wander around your house lost till you turn it off or electricity comes back. i dont’t see this second point mentioned anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Quite Satisfied, Pleased $ Will Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: If there were ANY ISSUES, they were because I did not fully read the instructions! It was refurbished, tried it to see IF it would really work for our needs with pet hair and it does when I clean it correctly!!
customer_reviews.author: Sher Saunders

customer_reviews.title: APP is junk, which makes 80% of this unuseable
customer_reviews.text: Robot works great but issues connection with the app which you need to control the robot in depth. App will not sync with robots wifi or if it does shows it as offline. Do you homework. ECOVACS app has a 2 star rating and questions all over Google how to fix these issues with no answers. Talked to ecovacs customer support and they just gave me the run around about restarting my router, phone, and ozmo 930, none of which solved issues. Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Roomba
customer_reviews.text: Quick, quiet and cleans more thoroughly than my Roomba! I’ve had several editions of the Roomba over the years and this Ecovac is better. It can not only keep up with kids (elementary school age) and dogs (Australian Shepherd) but my floors are cleaner than when I clean them! Love the app, haven’t had any problems with setting it up or it forgetting the map like previous reviewers mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Christychristychristy

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: does an outstandong job the trash residue bin speak for it self .
customer_reviews.author: Cristobal Ortiz Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: This is an unreliable and poor performing device. The Deebot app does not work and when my wife was finally able to connect in her phone, the device itself works really bad. There are much better vacuuming robots at much lower prices
customer_reviews.author: Prasanth Chandrahasan

product_meta.title: Ecovacs Deebot OZMO 930, Smart Robotic Vacuum, for Carpet, Bare Floors, Pet Hair, with Intelligent Mapping, Ozmo Mopping Technology, Adaptive Floor Sensing Technology, and Compatible with Alexa
product_meta.description:
The DEEBOT OZMO 930 represents the next generation of DEEBOTs, and is the first robotic vacuum that can change cleaning power based on floor type. With our revolutionary Adaptive Floor Sensing, DEEBOT OZMO 930 can alter its cleaning pattern on the fly based on whether it is in vacuuming or mopping mode. And the app comes with our leading Smart Navi mapping technology, scheduling, and support for Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant. 

Coupled with a carpet identification function, DEEBOT OZMO 930 provides an efficient cleaning solution for both carpet and hard floor. DEEBOT OZMO 930 can automatically boost its suction power for cleaning carpets, and use a vacuum and mop combo to clean hard floors deeply and thoroughly.
feature_bullets: Best value robotic vacuum: Reviewed - "For the number of smart features you get with the Ecovacs Deebot Ozmo 930, it's a good deal. If you want a robot vacuum to deal with an entire floor of a house—or your entire apartment—the 930 is a good deal."

Dust bin capacity - 470 milliliter. Smart Navi, laser-based navigation scans and maps cleaning areas so the DEEBOT learns and constantly adapts to your home, enabling efficient cleaning. Precision technology allows you to draw virtual boundaries or pinpoint specific areas to clean or avoid.

With Ecovacs latest adaptive floor sensing technology, the DEEBOT OZMO 930 will change its cleaning pattern on the fly depending on whether it is in vacuuming or mopping mode, all without user intervention. On carpet, DEEBOT OZMO 930 will increase suction power automatically for a deeper cleaning.

The DEEBOT Ozmo 930 has our latest mopping technology. Ozmo is a complete system with an electronically-controlled water pump, sensors that monitor water flow, and controls to stop the flow to ensure a consistent cleaning result.
Voice enabled control of DEEBOT available through Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant. Ecovas app allows you to schedule cleanings anytime, anywhere.
110 minute runtime and auto recharge and resume technology. Includes 1 year manufacturer's warranty and extra accessories kit.
